name: Fun In Systems
description:
This objkt is not art. But it's minted in the context of current development. 

The animation / GIF illustrates that entities of a system (art environment for instance) interact in a dynamic way, but of course the illustration is not correct or sufficient. So it's not explaining facts, but showing that a system evolves based on various inter-dependencies, interactions etc. It's no illustration of autopietic concepts and a very minimal design (even the mechanics are super limited here), but it might help to trigger thoughts on systems we would like to create. 

What is the role of a creator, what is the role of a collector? How are traditional systems impacted if persons act as artists and collectors? How could we optimize environments in a sustainable way, so that (in this case) a positive cultural impact can be achieved? Many discussions are still needed for the future of art and this little GIF is not making a statement at all. 

Credits: https://ncase.me/loopy/v1.1/
